key.name: slots
key.summary: Pinned items in slots, with copy options, favorite status, and timestamp.
key.description: This structure contains an array of items, where each item is an array with four elements: a string (text content), a path to an image, a favorite indicator, and a timestamp (unix time as string).

key.name: auto-arrange
key.summary: Option to auto arrange slots on change it.

key.name: image-polling
key.description: Re-check clipboard for image formats periodically. Useful for apps that delay exposing image MIME types.

key.name: incognito-mode
key.description: When enabled, clipboard changes are not captured.

key.name: auto-clear-enabled
key.summary: Enable automatic clearing of old items
key.description: When enabled, non-pinned items older than the configured time are removed.

key.name: auto-clear-minutes
key.description: Index for time intervals: 0 = 5 min, 1 = 10 min, 2 = 15 min, 3 = 30 min, 4 = 60 min
